title: Art and the community
brief_description: This film is a Commonwealth Teleview. Sir William Emrys Williams, Secretary-General of the Arts Council of Great Britain, answers questions put to him by Rooney Pelletier on various aspects of art sponsorship, with particular reference to the encouragement of opera, the theatre, music, ballet, painting and sculpture in Britain. No other credits available.
